comment: No, we can't feel sorry for the French nor anyone throughout the EU. Voters allowed this to happen to their respective countries. Americans, beware, this could be us if the demon-crats gain control.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (s / sorry-01
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :ARG2 (o / or
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (c / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "France")))
                        :op2 (a / anyone
                              :location (t / throughout
                                    :op1 (o2 / organization
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "EU")))))))
      :snt2 (a2 / allow-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (v / vote-01))
            :ARG1 (t2 / this)
            :beneficiary (c2 / country
                  :poss p3))
      :snt3 (b / beware-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :ARG1 (p5 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (w2 / we)
                  :condition (g / gain-02
                        :ARG0 (p6 / person
                              :mod (p7 / political-party
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Democrat")))
                        :ARG1 (c4 / control-01)))))

comment: It was a scam, the Dems do that in America but we were lucky. Clinton could have won but then again neither are behind bars yet so we're not there. French elections could have been rigged, like Swedens. Go thing there is Poland and Hungary who don't allow this nonsense to exist.
